questions.question: What is the range of short data type in Java?

answers: retrieving a return value from a method
stating a variable type and name

questions.question: What is the number 5 in this code: System.out.println("amount: "+5);
Which of the following primitive types can only have two possible values?

Which of the following ends an infinite for loop?

When does an else statement execute?
answers: when at least one preceding "if" or "else if" statement has returned false
when all preceding "if" and "else if" statements have returned true
always regardless of what previous statements have returned
when all preceding "if" and "else if" statements have returned false

answers: a number greater than or equal to zero
an expression that returns a value of true or false
